entries.title: Israel vows tough measures to 'strengthen' settlements following deadly attacks
entries.description: Israel will increase security and “strengthen the settlements” in response to attacks that killed seven Israelis and badly wounded five others.

entries.title: Bus crash kills at least 41 in southern Pakistan
entries.description: More than 40 people were killed after a bus fell into a ravine and caught fire in the southern Pakistani province of Balochistan on Sunday, officials said.

entries.title: Novak Djokovic beats Tsitsipas to win his 10th Australian Open and 22nd Slam
entries.description: Novak Djokovic was simply too good at the most crucial moments and claimed his 10th Australian Open championship and 22nd Grand Slam title.

entries.title: Russia’s aggressive espionage against Germany has prompted calls for a major overhaul of the country’s intelligence service
entries.description: A widening investigation of alleged Russian spying inside Germany’s intelligence service has set off alarms in the West and sparked calls to overhaul the BND.

entries.title: Ukraine repels attacks in eastern region while Russia’s Wagner claims to have taken a village
entries.description: Ukraine’s military said on Sunday its forces repelled an attack in the area of Blahodatne in the eastern part of the Donetsk region, while Russia’s Wagner private military group said it took control of the village.
